definition: (onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants
(onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants

sentences.english: Daming and Lingling can play the zither, too.
sentences.chinese: 大明和玲玲也會彈古箏。

sentences.english: Lingling, do you want to be in our football team?
sentences.chinese: 玲玲，你想加入我們的足球隊嗎？

sentences.english: I'm Wang Lingling and I'm thirteen years old.
sentences.chinese: 我叫王玲玲，我今年十三歲了。

sentences.english: Which is your bike, Lin Lin?
sentences.chinese: 玲玲，哪輛是你的自行車？

sentences.english: Lingling's in my class. She's my friend.
sentences.chinese: 玲玲和我同班班，她是我的朋友。

sentences.english: Huilian sings as beautifully as Lingling.
sentences.chinese: 惠蓮唱歌像玲玲一樣優美。

sentences.english: For ticketing, please contact Christine or Ling Ling.
sentences.chinese: 如須購票，請與陳嘉麗或玲玲聯絡。

sentences.english: Bello Nock, the star daredevil clown of the Ringling Bros.
sentences.chinese: 玲玲馬戲團中藝高人膽大的明星小丑貝洛。

sentences.english: Married couple Pan Lingling and Huang …
Lingling asked her friends to come to her home.
sentences.chinese: 玲玲邀請她的朋友到她家做客。

sentences.english: LIng Ling is the apple of her grandpa‘s eye.
sentences.chinese: 玲玲是她爺爺的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Li Lingling, the wife of the victim, Du Zhaoyu, will accompany the group.
sentences.chinese: 杜照宇的妻子李玲玲將一同前往。

sentences.english: Lingling remembers that it's tree planting this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 玲玲記得這周的活動是植樹。

definition: Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经
(Tw) (Internet slang) Greetings! (used when it's unknown what time the reader will see one's post, or just to be cute)
Xiaohao (c. 2200 BC), leader of the Dongyi 東夷|东夷[Dong1 yi2] or Eastern Barbarians
homophone group (group of homophone characters, in a rhyme book)
Alian District, a rural district in Kaohsiung, Taiwan
